results.title: Metformin Improves Autonomic Nervous System Imbalance and Metabolic Dysfunction in Monosodium L-Glutamate-Treated Rats

results.title: Metformin and retinal diseases in preclinical and clinical studies: Insights and review of literature.
results.text_hl: Prospective clinical data is needed to clarify @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s role in management of @<m>DISEASE_Autonomic_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001342 @@@posterior segment disorders@@@.
